name: places/ChIJUZeeuY5ZwokR9hsQTrrVaUY
formattedAddress: 110 Mercer St, New York, NY 10012, USA
adrFormatAddress: 110 Mercer St, New York, NY 10012, USA

originalText.text:
I purchased prescription sunglasses from this store some time ago. The shop assistants were all very kind and helpful. However, my experience with the prescription lenses wasn't entirely positive:

The prescription lenses took a month to be crafted, as it appears they had to involve a third party for the manufacturing process.
The resulting prescription lenses looked vastly different from the original lenses that came with the sunglasses.
Unfortunately, my initial order of prescription lenses had a defect, which led to an additional month-long wait for a remake.
Regrettably, the lens quality falls short in comparison to my other pairs from luxury brands, despite being the most expensive one I own.
Non-prescription lenses might be satisfactory based on other reviews, but I cannot recommend their prescription glasses based on my experience.

originalText.text: I've been a customer of this Cutler & Gross location for years! Their customer service is outstanding -- you can tell they really care about their clients and are passionate about eyewear. Most recently, I was thrilled to learn about their bespoke frame manufacturing after my vintage frames broke. They recreated my beloved glasses, and I couldn't be happier with the final product. Thank you to the whole team, especially Gaby, for their care and attention. :)

text.text: I've been a customer of this Cutler & Gross location for years! Their customer service is outstanding -- you can tell they really care about their clients and are passionate about eyewear. Most recently, I was thrilled to learn about their bespoke frame manufacturing after my vintage frames broke. They recreated my beloved glasses, and I couldn't be happier with the final product. Thank you to the whole team, especially Gaby, for their care and attention. :)

originalText.text: Dr. Byun (the in-house optometrist) gave a helpful and thorough eye exam and answered a ton of my questions in easy-to-understand detail. Millie helped pick a few great frames too

text.text: Dr. Byun (the in-house optometrist) gave a helpful and thorough eye exam and answered a ton of my questions in easy-to-understand detail. Millie helped pick a few great frames too

originalText.text: I went in there with a pair of sunglasses that are not thier brand and they were helpful. When I called on the phone they were also nice. High end place.

text.text: I went in there with a pair of sunglasses that are not thier brand and they were helpful. When I called on the phone they were also nice. High end place.

originalText.text:
My friend and I stopped by here to casually look for new eye wear.  We both ended up purchasing glasses.  First, the selection is great.  All the glasses are sturdy and well made.  I've worn my pair daily for 4 years and the shape has held up.  There's also great selection for sunglasses.  Second, customer service was great.  The sales person was highly knowledgeable and helped me to find good options.  They also recommended the right style.  They made slight adjustments and shipped out my eyewear to Boston within a few days.  And followed up with me to make sure I was satisfied.

I'm actually planning to stop by to purchase a second pair next time I'm in NYC.  I highly recommend this store.  It's high quality frames made in Europe and the right balance of style and functionality.
